properties.entry: select one_no, one_title, one_phone, one_place, one_status, location_no, one_agree, ent_people, tem_cate_name, onecategory_name, score, price, start_time, end_time from onedayclass a join thema_category b on a.tem_cate_no = b.tem_cate_no join one_category c on a.onecategory_no = c.onecategory_no order by 1 desc

select one_no, one_title, one_phone, one_place, one_status, location_no, one_agree, ent_people, tem_cate_name, onecategory_name, score, price, start_time, end_time from onedayclass a join thema_category b on a.tem_cate_no = b.tem_cate_no join one_category c on a.onecategory_no = c.onecategory_no where one_status = 'Y'
order by 1 desc

select one_no, one_title, one_phone, one_place, one_status, location_no, one_agree, ent_people, tem_cate_name, onecategory_name, score, price, start_time, end_time from onedayclass a join thema_category b on a.tem_cate_no = b.tem_cate_no join one_category c on a.onecategory_no = c.onecategory_no where one_status = 'N'
order by 1 desc

select one_no, one_title, one_phone, one_place, one_status, location_no, one_agree, ent_people, tem_cate_name, onecategory_name, score, price, start_time, end_time from onedayclass a join thema_category b on a.tem_cate_no = b.tem_cate_no join one_category c on a.onecategory_no = c.onecategory_no where one_agree = 3
order by 1 desc

select one_no, one_title, one_phone, one_place, one_status, a.location_no, one_agree, ent_people, tem_cate_name, onecategory_name, score, price, start_time, end_time, a.tem_cate_no, a.onecategory_no, location_name from onedayclass a join thema_category b on a.tem_cate_no = b.tem_cate_no join one_category c on a.onecategory_no = c.onecategory_no join area_category d on a.location_no = d.location_no where one_no = ? order by 1 desc
select file_no, origin_name, change_name, file_path, file_level, one_no from attechment where one_no = ?
update onedayclass set location_no = ?, one_title= ?, ent_people= ?, tem_cate_no = ?, onecategory_no = ?, price = ?, one_place = ?, Start_time = ?, END_TIME = ? where one_no = ?
update onedayclass set one_status = 'N' where ONE_NO = ?
